rules_text:
Foreshadow 4–{G} [i](If you cast this spell for its foreshadow cost, it enters with four time counters on it. Until the last is removed, it’s an artifact and not a creature. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it.)[/i]
When Thuul’s Lieutenant enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control.
